metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11544 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2017-11543.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2017-11543. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2017-11543 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2017-08-17').
